title: account banned for no reason
body: Hello , so yesterday i played one game , and at the end of it i got this message sayin that my account was permanently suspended and to check my email for further details.I havent got any email or any warning .just straight banned.i even submited a ticket to support but still nothing .

replies.body: No that's the thing i havent said anything toxic.besides that ive got banned in the previous years for verbal abuse so i know how it is.it just says the account has been suspended , to check my email and thats it..but i havent got anything from riot

It looks like someone noticed something suspicious enough to have warranted placing this protective suspension on the account. Most likely there were signs that your account was being or had been compromised, so this was placed to help protect it from further damage. We should be answering your ticket soon if not already, so be sure to check there for a response.
Have you been toxic? I've just seen your match history and it looks fine. Everyone sometimes has good games and bad.
